name: JezzBall
description:
Jezzball!

It's a race to clear the grid before time runs out in this action puzzle game! Swipe your finger and watch the red and blue lasers flow outwards and race to the edges of the grid. Only a strike from one of the ricocheting red-and-white balls will prematurely end its journey. Succeed in reaching the side and the grid will be sliced in half along your lasers lines.

Once you clear over 75% of the grid - you win! Earn more points the faster you clear and the more of the grid you clear in your final slice. Enjoy old-school arcade-style sound effects and graphics as you compete against other players in the Game Center leaderboards.

Jezzball App Features:
- iPhone, iPod touch, iPad compatible
- Game Center enabled
- Graphics designed for Retina displays - no fuzziness
- Available for iOS 5.1+
- Engineered to work perfectly with iPhone 4, iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPod touch, iPad, iPad 2, the new iPad, and the iPad mini
